Event.name: Silencing
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> causes a <fen>Speaker</fen> to become silent, sometimes about a particular <fen>Topic</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">The teacher</fex> <t>quieted</t> <fex name="Expressor">the children's laughter</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Agent is the person performing the intentional act.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The instrument with which an intentional act is performed.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which an intentional act is performed. <ex>John <t>quieted</t> the crowd <fex name="Purpose">to reassert his authority</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Speaker
Arg.definition: <def-root>The sentient entity that is not communicating.</def-root>

Arg.name: Topic
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the subject matter to which the Message pertains. It is typically expressed as a PP Complement headed by about.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> for which an intentional act is performed. <ex>I <t>hushed</t> him <fex name="Explanation">because quiet hours were in effect</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Result</fen> is the final state of the <fen>Speaker</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Expressor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Expressor</fen> is the <fen>Speaker</fen>'s voice or other communicative noise emitted by the <fen>Speaker</fen>. </def-root >

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the silencing event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously) and general descriptions comparing events (the same way).
<ex>Kim <t>shushed</t> Pat <fex name="Manner">rather haughtily</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Agent</fen> succeeds in creating silence.
<ex>Valois <t>silenced</t> the crowd <fex name="Degree">completely</fex> with one commanding gesture</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: shush.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: tell or signal to be silent

lexUnit.name: hush.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make someone become quiet

lexUnit.name: hush up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to cause someone to become quite

lexUnit.name: shut up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to cause someone or something to stop making noise

lexUnit.name: quiet.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make someone or something make less noise than he/she/it was making previously

lexUnit.name: quiet down.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make an entity make less noise than it was making previously
